MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G76 postcode area of Clarkston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.30pm to make repairs to faulty equipment at the corner of Field Road and Woodyett Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.09pm on the 4th of February 2021.
